Strengthening Our Partners
Supplier Diversity
We believe that having a diversified portfolio of 
vendors provides access to experts with a broad 
range of experiences and varied perspectives, 
resulting in the delivery of innovative solutions  
for our customers and the patients we serve.
In 2018, we set a goal to increase supplier diversity 
spend by 10 to 30 percent by 2021. In 2020, 
our supplier diversity spend was $64.8 million, 
representing a 41.2 percent increase over our  
spend in 2018.Health and Safety 
Achieving excellence in health and safety is a 
Company-wide responsibility. We are committed  
to engaging in employment practices that foster 
dignity and respect and meet the highest legal  
and ethical standards.
Strengthening Our Planet 
Committed to Building a Sustainable Business
Syneos Health is conscious of our impact on the environment. As we continue to grow, we embed our  
belief in the importance of building sustainable business practices in everything we do. We are committed  
to reducing our negative effects on the physical environment and doing our part to support the shift to  
a low-carbon economy to lessen the impacts of climate change through enhanced recycling programs, 
reduced energy usage and various environmental programs with sustainable benefits. 
SYNEOS HEALTH 2020 SUSTAINABILITY REPORT
